input.title: City Lights
input.narrative: A wistful, mid-tempo pop ballad about late-night city lights and longing for someone gone.
input.lyrics:
Verse 1:
Under neon skies, I wander slow
Through alleys of memory where the streetlights glow

Chorus:
Hold me in the silence, let the city glow
We were once a story everyone used to know

Verse 2:
Empty trains and coffee cups, echoes of your name
I trace the corners of our past, nothing feels the same
